Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

giveDonationToCause().details: Emits UserDonatedToProject event on successful donation

retrieveDonatedAmount().details: Implements checks-effects-interactions pattern and includes withdrawal penalties based on milestone progress

voteOnMilestone(bool).details: Votes are weighted by donation amount

params.support: True for supporting the milestone, false for opposing

giveDonationToCause().notice: Allows users to donate funds to the campaign

retrieveDonatedAmount().notice: Allows donors to withdraw their donations with a withdrawal fee

voteOnMilestone(bool).notice: Allows donors to vote on pending milestones
